publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-927 Robin Harper: Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon—That the Parliament notes the general plight of the Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon as a result of logging of their rainforest environment and specifically the potential dangers from development of the Chad-Cameroon oil pipeline and urges Her Majesty's Government to make representations to the World Bank, the Cameroonian Government and oil and logging companies on behalf of the Bagyeli to ensure that they are fully and independently consulted about the activities which affect them.
S1M-927 Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon (lodged on 31 May 2000) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-927 Robin Harper: Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon-That the Parliament notes the general plight of the Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon as a result of logging of their rainforest environment and specifically the potential dangers from development of the Chad-Cameroon oil pipeline and urges Her Majesty's Government to make representations to the World Bank, the Cameroonian Government and oil and logging companies on behalf of the Bagyeli to ensure that they are fully and independently consulted about the activities which affect them. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-927 Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon (lodged on 31 May 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Shona Robison*
S1M-927 Bagyeli Pygmies of Cameroon (lodged on 31 May 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Andrew Wilson*

Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Donald Gorrie, Linda Fabiani, Shona Robison, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr John McAllion
